title: Approved for PBE but can't make an account :o
body: Heyo, I recently got approved for PBE  but when I clicked on the link and tried to make a PBE account it took a while to load and then sent me to the page with a blitzcrank saying something went hextechnically wrong or something like that. Now when I try to go to make my account again it's not in the 3rd phase of the PBE process and its stuck at the 2nd phase where they received the application. Help :( I wanna be in PBE.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it doesn't seem like you've been approved quite yet. Be sure to keep an eye on your email for a confirmation if you do get chosen for the PBE Servers.

The "something went hextechnically wrong" error can pop up when you try to access the wrong PBE region. Since you were able to see your pending PBE status, It sounds like you've been able to get past that error.
